replies.body: Sweetheart Annie..Heartseeker Varus...What next? My Little Hecarim? {{champion:120}}

same lmfao
My little Hecarim{{champion:120}}. Spirit of dread = magic of friendship, onslaught of shadows = SO DARN BAD THAT I CAN'T BEAR TO WATCH
I almost died laughing at this
Too be honest, I think a My Little Hecarim would be a good skin, would be a bit to similar to arcade. Obviously copyright would crush that dream doe.

I feel like a d*ck posting this but, BRING BACK URF.

ROIT CAN THERE PLZ BE A NEW SINGED SKIN OR BUFF :D he is feeling loonly

The skins look sick, but do we really need another Annie skin? C'mon surely some others could do with a fresh face already.
i main azir...{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
what elo does the freelo champ not get perm banned for being brokenly over powered?
Good Job on another Ahri nerf Riot I am very pleased.
Another? The change concerning the removal of DFG was a *buff*.
and a massive over buff, as the past week or so has shown. and this nerf has confirmed.
